# The Function values Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Functions in this group operate on <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances that correspond to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">llvm::Function</a> instances. <a href="#details">More...</a>

</MembersIndexItem>

  type="&nbsp;"

</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

Functions in this group operate on <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances that correspond to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">llvm::Function</a> instances.

<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">llvm::Function</a>
</SectionUser>

<SectionDefinition>

### LLVMGetFunctionCallConv() {#ga36902516d7b958ce09642cfe8a96c887}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned LLVMGetFunctionCallConv (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> Fn)</>}>
Obtain the calling function of a function.

The returned value corresponds to the <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmccoretypes/#ga6bd315e1c1c05eb625e59a9f748e924f">LLVMCallConv</a> enumeration.

### LLVMGetIntrinsicDeclaration() {#gae31cd442e48be38030a97c21a2c49867}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetIntrinsicDeclaration (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> Mod, unsigned ID, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> &#42; ParamTypes, size&#95;t ParamCount)</>}>

For overloaded intrinsics, parameter types must be provided to uniquely identify an overload.

### LLVMIntrinsicCopyOverloadedName2() {#ga9537e3801e0a920c4af76a4360baa99b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>char &#42; LLVMIntrinsicCopyOverloadedName2 (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gad1d1bb5f901c903a0cf09c5a053c9c56">LLVMModuleRef</a> Mod, unsigned ID, <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#gab81b4df33167d47174f9b86a75e3be88">LLVMTypeRef</a> &#42; ParamTypes, size&#95;t ParamCount, size&#95;t &#42; NameLength)</>}>
Copies the name of an overloaded intrinsic identified by a given list of parameter types.

Unlike LLVMIntrinsicGetName, the caller is responsible for freeing the returned string.

This version also supports unnamed types.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a7157f9fa9dd11f234ec3c58517cb6d96">llvm::Intrinsic::getName()</a>
</SectionUser>
